Hi Nicoleta,

To test the SMTP configuration, we use the "Send test email to my account" checkbox in the Email Server Settings section. If the administrator account you are logged in with doesn't have an associated email address, the SMTP will not send the test email, even if it's set up correctly so we cannot determine if the settings are correct.

Regarding the duplicate accounts, it's likely that you have set up Active Directory Authentication, which is synchronizing admins from Active Directory, while also having manually created admin accounts.

If you're using a manually created admin account, please ensure it has an associated email address. Once set, try sending a test email to verify if the SMTP is correctly configured.


Please let me know if you need further assistance.
